name: Avast License File
summary: Learn about .AVASTLIC files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Avast sends AVASTLIC files to users as an email attachment after purchasing Avast software online. The license is required to validate the purchase of the Avast software. After validation, users can view the subscription information by selecting MAINTENANCE â†’ Subscription within the program.

After purchasing some versions of Avast, users may receive a License.dat file instead of an AVASTLIC file. In this case, the .dat file typically has a license key that can be copied by opening the file with a text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad.
NOTE: Avast discontinued Pro Antivirus and Internet Security, and its software no longer utilizes AVASTLIC files.

instructions: You can open an AVASTLIC file with Avast Pro Antivirus and Avast Internet Security. If you have installed the software, you can double-click the file to open it, too.
You can also open an AVASTLIC file by clicking the "Insert license file" button in the program's "Subscription" window, or supply the license file during the software installation process.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
